description:
As the "X" phenomenon spreads among NEXT throughout the city, Yuri gathers the heroes and gives them some bad news.
Source: netflix

titles.title: Kami wa Ha no Nai Mono ni Kurumi o Sazukeru
The Gods Send Nuts to Those Who Have No Teeth.
The gods send nuts to those who have no teeth. 神は歯のない者にクルミを授ける
